Activity: Log in, check emails. Focus on player feedback and UI polish.
Review player feedback from the previous playtests. Identify common complaints and suggestions for improvement.
Implement changes to address the player feedback. Focus on improving the overall user experience.
Lunch break. Look at some cool weapon designs on ArtStation.
Add polish to the UI elements. Improve the visual appeal and usability of the in-game menus and HUD.
Test the game with the updated UI. Gather feedback from other team members to identify any remaining issues.
Implement further adjustments to the UI based on the feedback received.
Final code commit. Review week's progress and plan for the next week's tasks. Celebrate the end of the week with a well-deserved beer. Send email to @all to review this week work.
